variants.desc:
A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. However, the desire that drove it has long since been twisted and distorted.

skills.name: Liberation of the Golden Age
skills.desc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to a random target. The number of attacks is equal to the "Gauge Recollection" stacks remaining. If there is no "Gauge Recollection," this ability will fail.

skills.name: Fleeting Gilded Spikes
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Fleeting Punishment
skills.desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Binding of the Golden Age
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state and gains 9 Gauge Recollection stacks. Casts Liberation of the Golden Age in the next action. Every time this unit is attacked, lose 1 stack of Gauge Recollection.

skills.name: Fleeting Veil
skills.desc: Slightly reduces DMG received from Basic ATKs, Skills, Ultimates, and follow-up attacks, with a small chance to inflict Imprisonment on the target attacked by Decaying Shadow.

variants.name: Decaying Shadow (Bug)
variants.desc:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The original referent entity is a shadow manifested by the power of Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A physical embodiment of the desires of intelligent life in the Fragmentum, like a pearl created from a single grain of sand. However, its purpose has long since been twisted and distorted.
